array( Processed string , Was the string changed ).

Exception - An exception of this type is thrown.

Definition at line 94 of file data_extension_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 
                                                                                                'data_field' , array( 'id' => TERMINAL_VALUE ) ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->Settings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
                              
                              $Template = '<input type="text" name="'.$this->Settings->get_setting( 'name' ).'" value="'.
                                    $this->DataExtensionAccess->get_data( 
                                          $this->Settings->get_setting( 'id' ) , $this->Settings->get_setting( 'type' ) , 
                                          $this->Settings->get_setting( 'name' ) 
                                    ).'">';
                              
                              $Template = str_replace( '{class}' , 'width_320 flat' , $Template );
                              
                              $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{data_field:$MacroParameters}" , $Template , $ProcessingString );
                              
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 150 of file data_extension_view.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $ProcessingString , 
                                                                                                      'get_data' , array( 'id' => TERMINAL_VALUE ) ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->Settings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
                              
                              $Data = $this->DataExtensionAccess->get_data( 
                                    $this->Settings->get_setting( 'id' ) , 
                                    $this->Settings->get_setting( 'type' ) , 
                                    $this->Settings->get_setting( 'name' )
                              );
                              
                              $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{get_data:$MacroParameters}" , $Data , $ProcessingString );
                              
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
